definitions: the quality or fact of being in the middle of somewhere or something.
shortDefinitions: quality or fact of being in the middle of somewhere or something

definitions: the state of being accessible from a variety of places

examples.text: he believes that the location's centrality can only be an added advantage for guests

shortDefinitions: state of being accessible from variety of places

definitions: the quality of being essential or of the greatest importance

examples.text: the centrality of religion in their lives
the centrality and sovereignty of the state
